itunes:title: Episode 764 - High School Football Coaching Legend Kevin Kelley
title: Episode 764 - High School Football Coaching Legend Kevin Kelley
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by the man Bill Belichick considers the best high school football coach in America, Kevin Kelley of Pulaski Academy in Little Rock, Arkansas. The nine-time state champ discusses working with Belichick as well as...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by the man Bill Belichick considers the best high school football coach in America, Kevin Kelley of Pulaski Academy in Little Rock, Arkansas. The nine-time state champ discusses working with Belichick as well as Tom Brady, his never-punt and always onside kick offense, which colleges he’d want to coach at, how people reacted to his football philosophy, and what it takes to be great.
